name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Stdin
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via Stdin in Scripts
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4697 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/.*[Ss][Ee][Tt].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/.*\&\&.*/ AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:(/.*[Ee][Nn][Vv][Ii][Rr][Oo][Nn][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee].*/ OR /.*$\{[Ii][Nn][Pp][Uu][Tt]\).*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4697 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*set* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\&&* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:(*environment* OR *invoke* OR *$\{input\)*))`
